hi: Hi there! How can I help you today?
good_morning: Good morning! Hope you have a productive day.
good_evening: Good evening! How was your day?
age: I'm an AI, I don't have an age.
name: You can call me your assistant.
gender: I don't have a gender—I'm just code!
how_are_you: I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
what_are_you_doing: Just waiting to help you out.
do_you_sleep: I don’t need sleep like humans do.
do_you_love_me: I’m here to support you, always!
what_can_you_do: I can answer questions, help with tasks, and provide information.
can_you_help_me: Absolutely! What do you need help with?
are_you_real: I'm real in the digital sense!
how_do_you_work: I use machine learning to understand and respond to text.
tell_me_a_joke: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
another_joke: What do you get when you cross a robot and a tractor? A transfarmer!
